Tucson definitely agreed with Rodimus.  They needed more information on the=
 insectoids before they could actually do anything about them. He had learn=
ed that first hand himself.

"I agree Rodimus, they will not know what hit =
them, but in order to create such an impact, we must know more about the in=
sectoids we encountered.  I too got that impression, when we were dealing w=
ith them.  They seemed extremely wise as heartless as they were.  Perhaps a=
 recon mission is in order.."

He then continues to give the spark to Stant=
on.

"I see Stanton, you know best but if this can help Nightlight physical=
ly, please give it to her."

Rat Trap raises his paw with a serious look on=
 his rodent face.

"I'll do it Sir, I'll do the recon mission."

Night Shif=
t raises his hand.

"Ditto.  You want Intel, I'm will'n ta help."

Straight=
 Shot raises her hand as does Quickstride who replies for them both.

"Well=
, looks like we're in too.  You'll need backup guys, and we're just as good=
 as anyone for that."

Tucson nodds.

" That's very brave of you to offer. =
 Rodimus, and I can guide you through the tunnels, and as soon as you learn=
 anything, report back to the Ark as soon as possible and do not try to for=
m an attack on your own."

They all reply.

"Yes Sir."

Tucson turns his he=
ad back to Rodimus.

" I can not see, and you can.  Can you remember the ge=
ological layout of those tunnels?  Rat Trap and the others will need those =
for recon purposes."

ot to restore her lost
